targets.query: SELECT mean("p99.0") FROM "graphql.query.latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "graphql.latency.by.query.type" fill(0)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("count"), $variableinterval) FROM "graphql.query.response.code.counter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "response.code.by.graphql.query.type", "response.code.by.graphql.code"

panels.title: GraphQL Response Status Code By Query

targets.query: SELECT mean("p99.0") FROM "graphql.query.latency" WHERE $timeFilter AND "graphql.latency.by.service"!='' GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "graphql.latency.by.service" fill(0)

SELECT mean("p99.0") FROM "graphql.query.latency" WHERE $timeFilter AND "graphql.latency.by.service"!='' GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "graphql.latency.by.service", "graphql.latency.by.query.type" fill(0)

panels.title: GraphQL Latency By Service And Query Type

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("count"), $variableinterval) FROM "octopus.metadata.message.decoding.errors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("count"), $variableinterval) FROM "octopus.metadata.message.decoding.errors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "source"

panels.title: Kafka message decoding errors by source

targets.query: SELECT mean("max") FROM "jvm.memory.used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", time($variableinterval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.threads.total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
SELECT mean("max") FROM "process.cpu.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
SELECT mean("count") FROM "host.network.data.read" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
SELECT mean("count") FROM "host.network.data.write" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
SELECT mean("max") FROM "host.cpu.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
SELECT mean("sum") FROM "jvm.gc" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($variableinterval), "host"
